title: Ghosts Can't Dance by Charlotte Healy
description: Ghosts Can't Dance by Charlotte Healy. Read by Rhiannon Neads from the BBC Radio Drama Company. A Top 50 shortlisted story from BBC Radio 2's 500 WORDS 2015 competition, in the 9 and under category.
